      • getGroundTruth

        public static java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getGroundTruth(int indexOfColumn,
                                                                                        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> selectedUsers,
                                                                                        java.lang.String absFileNameToRead,
                                                                                        boolean hasColHeader)
        Reads the given file and the column at the given index is read as the manual clusters to be used as class labels for the user. Returns the map containg (raw user id, manual cluster)
        ALERT: ensure that the order of users is correct in ground truth file
        Parameters:
        indexOfColumn - starts from 0
        selectedUsers -
        absFileNameToRead -
        hasColHeader - whether the file to be read has column header
        Returns:
        the map containg (raw user id, manual cluster)
